text: The closing ceremony of 2024 Summer Olympics happened at August 11, 2024 9:00 PM CEST time zone. It happened at Paris, France. Before the closing ceremony, the shirtless man climb the Eiffel Tower. After this the police officers came to the Eiffel Tower to see the shirtless man. About 9,000 people came here. It ended at 11:30 PM CEST time zone. Category:2024 Summer Olympics
title: 2024 Summer Olympics closing ceremony
